headline: How Investors Are Reacting To KKR (KKR) Acquiring €65 Billion of PayPal’s European BNPL Loans
summary: On November 17, 2025, PayPal announced a new agreement allowing KKR-managed credit funds to purchase up to €65 billion of European buy now, pay later (BNPL) loan receivables, with PayPal retaining customer-facing responsibilities. This sizeable transaction further embeds KKR in the digital payments and alternative lending sector, highlighting its expanding influence as a capital provider in key European markets. With KKR deepening its role in European BNPL debt acquisition, we'll explore how...
